entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
